name: recentralization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act or process of centralizing a system, company, country, etc. (= removing authority to one central place) again, after this has already been done once or more: In the past year, there's been a clear trend toward re-centralization of the economy. At the end of the eighteenth century, he satisfied his conservative instincts by a recentralisation of government. Related word
centralize
More examplesFewer examplesRecentralization of business may be a fashionable philosophy.His radical supporters resisted "administrative recentralization".She strongly supported re-centralization of the ecclesiastical system.
